overview: When a focused, hard working Londoner, Emily (Renee Bourke), travels to LA to seal some business deals, this cut and dry business trip takes a detour when she meets an easy going musician, Nick (Paris Dylan), who is in need of a push in the right direction. On the contrary, Nick opens Emily's mind to a world outside of her controlled work environment. Their bond is strong, but put to the test when Emily's trip home is expedited.
title: Across the Pond
